alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 15 at 11:40AM PDT until July 15 at 2:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: .High monsoonal moisture over the region will result in afternoon thunderstorms that could produce very heavy rainfall, especially in high terrain areas of east-central and southern Nevada. Rainfall rates of over 1 inch per hour could result from these thunderstorms in these locations. Lower elevation areas will also see thunderstorms today but flash flood risk is expected to be more marginal in nature. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southern Nevada, including the following areas, Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor for the issuance of Flash Flood Warnings this afternoon and be prepared to take action should they be issued.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
